h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master
content: Despite this, the new phase won't actually begin until he grabs his sword again and charges at you, twisting his tail to slam down on you, and following up with two slow sword swings. Only then will a short cutscene , and his true curse comes into .

The content is as follows:
Despite this, the new phase won't actually begin until he grabs his sword again and charges at you, twisting his tail to slam down on you, and following up with two slow sword swings. Only then will a short cutscene , and his true curse comes into .
